body_html:
@yifeif : ping this PR because we found something strange.

This PR is merged, however the bazel-toolchains' pin in file has NOT updated in the master branch (and we didn't find that this commit got reverted):
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L696

Could you help look into this as well?

body:
@yifeif : ping this PR because we found something strange. 

This PR is merged, however the bazel-toolchains' pin in file has NOT updated in the master branch (and we didn't find that this commit got reverted):
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L696

Could you help look into this as well?
